content.question: In selecting members of the White House staff, Presidents primarily seek people who

choices.label: give the White House ideological balance
are personally loyal to the President
will help the President develop a good working relationship with Congress
can bring a nonpartisan perspective to policy deliberations

content.answer: are personally loyal to the President
